problem.markdown:
1. What is the value of x at the end of the script above? = 12
2. What is the value of y at the end of the script above? = -1
3. What will the sprite say? = -224
[explanation] You can join two numbers and get another number. [explanation]
problem.p: 1. What is the value of x at the end of the script above?
2. What is the value of y at the end of the script above?

div.p: You can join two numbers and get another number.
